/usr/bin/gcc   -msse -W -Wall  -O2 -g    CMakeFiles/test_driver.dir/test_driver.c.o  -o test_driver -rdynamic ../lib/liballegro.so.5.0.10 ../lib/liballegro_main.so.5.0.10 ../lib/liballegro_image.so.5.0.10 ../lib/liballegro_color.so.5.0.10 ../lib/liballegro_font.so.5.0.10 ../lib/liballegro_ttf.so.5.0.10 ../lib/liballegro_primitives.so.5.0.10 -lpng ../lib/liballegro_font.so.5.0.10 -lfreetype -lz ../lib/liballegro.so.5.0.10 -lm -lpthread -lSM -lICE -lX11 -lXext -lXcursor -lXinerama -lXrandr -lGL -lGLU -Wl,-rpath,/home/anhong/Downloads/allegro/b/lib
